title: Controlly Services
text: You Have Complete Control of Social Media Services! Met Controlly Services, An App to Provide You with Account Statistics and Tips.

title: Spolist.app
text: Spolist is a Music Listening Plugin Application. Its main purpose is to bring you together with people who are similar to you in the types of music you listen to.

title: WAGMI
text: Saas Solution that Improves the Performance of E-sports Teams and Individual Players.
